results.title: Antinociception and anti-inflammation induced by simvastatin in algesiometric assays in mice.
results.text_hl: A possible clinical role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could be related to the potentially beneficial effects in the @<m>DISEASE_Neuralgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009437 @@@neuropathic pain@@@, and by their pleiotropic properties, they could play a clinical role in anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory disease@@@.
